content.query:
CREATE VIEW SalesLT_CountryRegionCurrency AS
SELECT
TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
BULK 'https://mottadeproj.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Sales/CountryRegionCurrency/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS [result];


SELECT * FROM SalesLT_CountryRegionCurrency


DROP STOREDPROCEDURE CreateSQLServerlessView_gold
